00042     *
00043     * Created so we can set a default that respects the user's choice of API,
00044     * unlike Pa_GetDefaultOutputDevice() which always returns the default
00045     * device in the default API.
00046     * @param index Which HostAPI in the lists mHostNames / mHostIndexes / 
00047     * mHostLabels the user has selected.
00048     */
